HOME.BE_THERE_FOR_THEM: Be there for them even if you can’t be with them
HOME.USE_YOUR_PHONE_TO_CREATE_VIDEO_OR_VOICE: Use your phone to create video or voice messages that be delivered to your family and friends after your passing.
HOME.AT_BEYOND_WE_UNDERSTAND: At Beyond, we understand legacy knows no timeline–so we’re here to help you stay connected to loved ones in perpetuity!
HOME.RECORD_AND_WRITE_MESSAGE: Record & Write messages that are delivered to loved ones after you're gone
HOME.STORE_IMPORTANT_PASSWORD: Store important passwords in the Beyond Cloud making life easier for your loved ones when the time comes.
HOME.CREATE_VITAL_DOCUMENTS_LAST_WILL: Create vital documents such as your last will & testament.
HOME.WITH_BEYOND_YOU_CAN_PROVIDE_LIFE_LONG_AD: With Beyond, you can provide life-changing advice to the young. Your wisdom is a valuable asset that so many could learn from
HOME.ASSIGN_BENEFICIARY_TO_MAINTAIN_PEACE: Assign a beneficiary to maintain peace among your family
HOME.ENJOY_REAL_CUSTOMER_SUPPORT: Enjoy real customer support from our Beyond team. We're one call away
